name: Blubird and the Home Quarantine
description:
Blubird and the Home Quarantine

Hey so like... If you are looking for a full fledged game, I'm sorry, but this is the wrong place. This "game" is like 4 minutes long. I mean, I guess you can make it longer if you want.  But like normal gameplay will be very short. This is a Joke game being used as a trailer for my next game, Blubird and the Memory Machine, which is a sequel to Blubird and the Golden Heart, so play those.

The Story goes like this: Blubird had just moved into his new house in Festival City, when he gets a news report on his Laptop telling everyone to stay indoors due to some "Cologna-Virus." Can he fight the pure boredom as it crawls to follow him?
